TestCase.name: testArrayType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ARRAY['Hi', 'Hello', c] FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ARRAY(_UTF-16LE'Hi', _UTF-16LE'Hello', $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[ARRAY(_UTF-16LE'Hi', _UTF-16LE'Hello', c) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testConjunctiveFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE a < 10 AND b > 20

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($0, 10), >($1, 20))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[((a < 10) AND (b > 20))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDisjunctiveFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE a < 10 OR a > 20

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(<($0, 10), >($0, 20))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[SEARCH(a, Sarg[(-∞..10), (20..+∞)])]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFilterOnNonAsciiLiteral
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, c, c || TRIM(' 世界 ') FROM MyTable WHERE c = '你好'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], EXPR$3=[||($2, TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), _UTF-16LE' ', _UTF-16LE' 世界 '))]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'你好')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, CAST(_UTF-16LE'你好':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE") AS c, CAST(_UTF-16LE'你好世界':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE") AS EXPR$3], where=[(c = _UTF-16LE'你好':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE")]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFilterWithDateType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable3 WHERE b = DATE '1984-07-12' AND c = TIME '14:34:24' AND d = TIMESTAMP '1984-07-12 14:34:24'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, 1984-07-12), =($2, 14:34:24), =($3, 1984-07-12 14:34:24))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a, CAST(1984-07-12) AS b, CAST(14:34:24) AS c, CAST(1984-07-12 14:34:24:TIMESTAMP(3)) AS d], where=[((b = 1984-07-12) AND (c = 14:34:24) AND (d = 1984-07-12 14:34:24:TIMESTAMP(3)))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testIn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE b IN (1, 3, 4, 5, 6) AND c = 'xx'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(OR(=($1, 1), =($1, 3), =($1, 4), =($1, 5), =($1, 6)), =($2, _UTF-16LE'xx'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(SEARCH(b, Sarg[1, 3, 4, 5, 6]) AND SEARCH(c, Sarg[_UTF-16LE'xx':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"]:VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMixedType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ROW(a, b, c), ARRAY[12, b], MAP[a, c] FROM MyTable5 WHERE (a, b, c) = ('foo', 12, TIMESTAMP '1984-07-12 14:34:24')

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ROW($0, $1, $2)], EXPR$1=[ARRAY(12, $1)], EXPR$2=[MAP($0, $2)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(ROW($0, $1, $2), CAST(ROW(_UTF-16LE'foo', 12, 1984-07-12 14:34:24)):RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" EXPR$0, INTEGER EXPR$1, TIMESTAMP(3) EXPR$2) NOT NULL)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable5, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[ROW(a, b, c) AS EXPR$0, ARRAY(12, b) AS EXPR$1, MAP(a, c) AS EXPR$2], where=[(ROW(a, b, c) = CAST(ROW(_UTF-16LE'foo', 12, 1984-07-12 14:34:24)))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable5, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiFilters
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE b > 0) t WHERE a < 50

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 50)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[((b > 0) AND (a < 50))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultipleFlattening
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MyTable2.a.*, c, MyTable2.b.* FROM MyTable2
LogicalProject(_1=[$0._1], _2=[$0._2], c=[$2], _10=[$1._1], _20=[$1._2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a._1 AS _1, a._2 AS _2, c, b._1 AS _10, b._2 AS _20]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiProjects
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM (SELECT a, c FROM MyTable)
LogicalProject(c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNonPrimitiveMapType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAP[a, c] FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[MAP($0, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[MAP(a, c) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNotIn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE b NOT IN (1, 3, 4, 5, 6) OR c = 'xx'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(NOT(OR(=($1, 1), =($1, 3), =($1, 4), =($1, 5), =($1, 6))), =($2, _UTF-16LE'xx'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(SEARCH(b, Sarg[(-∞..1), (1..3), (3..4), (4..5), (5..6), (6..+∞)]) OR SEARCH(c, Sarg[_UTF-16LE'xx':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"]:VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOnlyFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE b > 0
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(b > 0)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOnlyProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testPojoType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable4
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable4, source: [TestTableSource(a)]]])
LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable4, source: [TestTableSource(a)]]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveMapType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAP[b, 30, 10, a] FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[MAP($1, 30, 10, $0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[MAP(b, 30, 10, a) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testProjectAndFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b + 1 FROM MyTable WHERE b > 2
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, (b + 1) AS EXPR$1], where=[(b > 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithDateType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, c, DATE '1984-07-12', TIME '14:34:24', TIMESTAMP '1984-07-12 14:34:24' FROM MyTable

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], EXPR$3=[1984-07-12], EXPR$4=[14:34:24], EXPR$5=[1984-07-12 14:34:24]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c, 1984-07-12 AS EXPR$3, 14:34:24 AS EXPR$4, 1984-07-12 14:34:24 AS EXPR$5]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithNaming
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `1-_./Ü`, b, c FROM (SELECT a as `1-_./Ü`, b, c FROM MyTable)
LogicalProject(1-_./Ü=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRowType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ROW(1, 'Hi', a) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ROW(1, _UTF-16LE'Hi', $0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[ROW(1, _UTF-16LE'Hi', a) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
